title: Huge potential for growth in Europe: Royal Enfield CEO
description: The Chennai-headquartered firm, a part of Eicher Motors, currently sells bikes all across the continent and has a market share of around 8.5 per cent in the middle-weight motorcycle segment.  In an interaction on the sidelines of the annual EICMA motor show here, Royal Enfield CEO B Govindarajan said the company believes in replicating the success it enjoys in the Indian market in the middleweight segment in international markets as well.
